page.title: 17ASHWELL SHOW ORGANISATION
page.content: The Ashwell Show is organised by a committee of local villagers, doctors, farmers and businessmen. They meet about once a month throughout the year. It is held on August Bank Holiday Monday. It is such a large show that over a hundred people are needed to get the fields ready. It is estimated that the attendance for the past two years has been in the region of 6 to 7,000 and the profit between Â£5,500 and Â£6,000. The profits are distributed as a result of the decisions of the committee. All organisations helping on the day receive donations. The largest sums go to worthy causes in the area.
